name: Ouroboros (itch) (Raccoon_JS)
description:
I made this game under 72 hours only with two different shapes and the theme of "exploration". And this is also an entry for Geta Game Jam - where its theme is "alchemy". That's why I made my Yume Nikki-like game Ouroboros.

Control:

Arrow keys - controlling player, the white circle.
ENTER - interact
ESC - reset the game and go back to the menu screen
